type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.maven.MavenPom
type.description: * The POM for a Maven publication. * * The {@link #withXml(org.gradle.api.Action)} method can be used to modify the descriptor after it has been generated according to the publication data. * * @since 1.4

method.name: getPackaging
method.description: * Returns the packaging for this publication.

method.name: setPackaging
method.description: * Sets the packaging for this publication.

method.name: withXml
method.description:
* Allows configuration of the POM, after it has been generated according to the input data. * * 
     * apply plugin: "maven-publish"
     *
     * publishing {
     *   publications {
     *     maven(MavenPublication) {
     *       pom.withXml {
     *         asNode().appendNode('description', 'A demonstration of Maven POM customization')
     *       }
     *     }
     *   }
     * }
     *
* * Note that due to Gradle's internal type conversion system, you can pass a Groovy closure to this method and * it will be automatically converted to an {@code Action}. *

* Each action/closure passed to this method will be stored as a callback, and executed when the publication * that this descriptor is attached to is published. *

* For details on the structure of the XML to be modified, see the POM reference. * * @param action The configuration action. * @see MavenPublication * @see XmlProvider

property.name: packaging
property.description: * Returns the packaging for this publication.
